thread.title: Egyptian players abroad: Elneny plays as Basel beat Sion, Injured Trezeguet misses Anderlecht victory - Talents Abroad - Sports

author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Egyptian players abroad: Elneny plays as Basel beat Sion, Injured Trezeguet misses Anderlecht victory - Talents Abroad - Sports
text:
(All times Cairo local time, GMT+2)
Saturday 17 October
Mohamed Salah (AS Roma)
The forward scored his fourth Serie A goal, finding the net on 69 minutes as Roma defeated Empoli 3-1.
Amro Tarek (Real Betis)
The central defender is yet to make his Real Betis debut after being left out of the squad for the La Liga game against Espanyol.
Sunday 18 October
Mohamed Elneny (Basel)
The midfielder played the full 90 minutes in Basel's 2-0 win over Sion. He received a yellow card on minute 67.
Mahmoud 'Trezeguet' Hassan (Anderlecht)
The midfielder missed Anderlecht's 4-0 win over Zulte-Waregem due to injury
(For more sports news and updates, follow Ahram Online Sports on Twitter at @AO_Sports and on Facebook at AhramOnlineSports .)
